capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid has a few hobbies. Apparently, one of them is taking care of his pets. He's really passionate about it, you know? I think it's great that he gets to spend time with those animals every day.

You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He's got a special bond with them, and it's really endearing to see him care for them so much. I mean, who wouldn't want a Hippogriff as a pet? It's like he's found a way to connect with these magical creatures in a way that's just unique to him.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of pets does valeria have?
